For JASPAR 2022 release we curated motifs derived from the following sources:

  - Human TF dimers motifs derived from SELEX
  - Human Zinc finger TF motifs derived from ChIP-seq and ChIP-exo 
  - *Ciona robusta* motifs derived from SELEX
  - Yeast motifs derived from ChIP-exo 
  - *Cnidaria* motifs derived from ATAC-seq
